actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on floor coverings and mats, of over 30% recycled Polyethylene (PE) or Ethylene-Vinyl Acetate (EVA), of the kind used for temporary cushioning for children and adults.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on floor coverings and mats, of over 30% recycled Polyethylene (PE) or Ethylene-Vinyl Acetate (EVA), of the kind used for temporary cushioning for children and adults.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on floor coverings and mats, of over 30% recycled Polyethylene (PE) or Ethylene-Vinyl Acetate (EVA), of the kind used for temporary cushioning for children and adults.
